name: INSearchForMediaIntent
desc: A request to search for a media item.

items.name: init(mediaItems: [INMediaItem]?, mediaSearch: INMediaSearch?)
items.desc: Creates an intent that describes the media items for which to search and where to search for them.

items.name: var mediaItems: [INMediaItem]?
items.desc: The media items for which to search.

items.name: var mediaSearch: INMediaSearch?
items.desc: The location to search for the media item.
